snippet: Chauncey Billups, the Clippers' veteran guard and a five-time All-Star, tore his left Achilles' tendon during a game at Orlando on Monday.
abstract: Chauncey Billups, the Clippers' veteran guard and a five-time All-Star, tore his left Achilles' tendon during a game at Orlando on Monday.
lead_paragraph: The career of Chauncey Billups, the Clippers veteran guard and five-time All-Star, could be threatened, as he tore his left Achilles' tendon during a game at Orlando on Monday.
